news.title: Beta Launch!
news.content: We are excited to announce the beta launch of our image processing service! Segmentation and keypoint extraction features are available. Weight estimation coming soon!

news.title: Segmentation Model Improved
news.content: The segmentation model (v1.1) has been updated. Improved accuracy for object boundaries on complex backgrounds.

news.title: New Website Design
news.content: Introducing the updated design of our application! We've tried to make it more user-friendly and visually appealing in the dark theme.
